originalText.text: Dr. Bassiri was amazing!  He took his time answering all my questions about Botox and was very knowledgeable. I felt very comfortable and confident in Dr. Bassiri work and the wonderful staff that was with me including Annalise, Marissa and the nurse. All great. I will be going back for another treatment.  You won’t be disappointed!!!

text.text: Dr. Bassiri was amazing!  He took his time answering all my questions about Botox and was very knowledgeable. I felt very comfortable and confident in Dr. Bassiri work and the wonderful staff that was with me including Annalise, Marissa and the nurse. All great. I will be going back for another treatment.  You won’t be disappointed!!!

originalText.text: I am super happy with my nose results with Dr. Bassiri. I felt informed about the process and he broke down what he felt comfortable doing and exactly how he would accomplish my desired result. I was confident he could see my vision as we worked together to create a beautiful shape that still let me feel like myself. I cannot thank him enough!

text.text: I am super happy with my nose results with Dr. Bassiri. I felt informed about the process and he broke down what he felt comfortable doing and exactly how he would accomplish my desired result. I was confident he could see my vision as we worked together to create a beautiful shape that still let me feel like myself. I cannot thank him enough!

originalText.text:
Dr. Bassiri exceeded my
expectations with my filler!! His precision and expertise transformed my
appearance subtly yet remarkably. The
results are extremely natural & I couldn't be happier. He spent ample amount of time answering all of my questions/concerns & discussing future treatments. Dr Bassiri & his staff are all very knowledgeable & professional. A very enjoyable experience that I highly recommend. Will definitely be back soon :)

originalText.text: Had the best experience with Dr Bassiri as my surgeon! He took the time and didn’t rush me through my consultations and my procedure was painless!! I felt cared for the entire time. He is the most genuine surgeon and I wouldn't trust anyone else with my face! Thank you so much!

text.text: Had the best experience with Dr Bassiri as my surgeon! He took the time and didn’t rush me through my consultations and my procedure was painless!! I felt cared for the entire time. He is the most genuine surgeon and I wouldn't trust anyone else with my face! Thank you so much!

originalText.text: Dr. Bassiri is a master of his craft. I did Botox and nose filler and I could not be happier with my results. He truly understands facial aesthetics and his surgical training takes his injectable technique to the next level. I am a physician myself and wouldn’t let anyone else touch my face. Besides technique, he is incredibly personable and will make any patient feel comfortable.

text.text: Dr. Bassiri is a master of his craft. I did Botox and nose filler and I could not be happier with my results. He truly understands facial aesthetics and his surgical training takes his injectable technique to the next level. I am a physician myself and wouldn’t let anyone else touch my face. Besides technique, he is incredibly personable and will make any patient feel comfortable.
